Posts.EditableText: Can I only save if I have downloaded a game? Games dont seem to save
Posts.HTML: Can I only save if I have downloaded a game? Games dont seem to save

Posts.EditableText: No, as a registered user you can save online, too? But you can create only one savegame and it is saved on the server. So when you start the game again, you are asked to resume or to start a new game
Posts.HTML: No, as a registered user you can save online, too? But you can create only one savegame and it is saved on the server. So when you start the game again, you are asked to resume or to start a new game
